content:
@Virginia Lorenzi asked @Keith Boone if there was a capture of his "reading of the rule" that he did last week at the VHC virtual event.

Here's a small tweetstorm he did, before & after the event https://threadreaderapp.com/thread/1237819489267396613.html

Here's [his 33 minute segment of the day-long YouTube event capture [(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XuJ47lE9GiU&feature=youtu.be&t=24741)

HINT: Be like a modern student and play it back at higher speed, bringing 33 minutes down to 22:
image.png

(I must say, either he's a wizard or he's a GREAT smoke blower.)

(I must say, either he's a wizard or he's a GREAT smoke blower.)

Those options aren't mutually exclusive ;)

Some would say the two go well together ... in a way that's related to the experience of good care, as a companion to actually getting scientifically good treatment.

I mean.... don't just inform me; leaving me FEELING informed. Right? (And a small dash of "How did he do that???" is always good.)
